definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Data recorded along two geophone axes are displayed as a function of time.
sentences.chinese: 沿兩個檢波器座標軸記錄的數據顯示爲一個時間函數。

sentences.english: Does your facility have motion detectors ?
sentences.chinese: 你的設施有動作檢波器嗎？

sentences.english: We can produce different pattern of geophone string to satisfy the customers.
sentences.chinese: 可根具用戶要求，生產不同組合形式的檢波器串。

sentences.english: The orientation of crosswell 3-D component geophone is critical to processing of crosswell seismic data.
sentences.chinese: 井間三分量檢波器的方位確定是井間資料處理的關鍵。

sentences.english: The seismometers are usually termed geophones .
sentences.chinese: 地震計一般稱爲地震檢波器。

sentences.english: Seismometers listen out not just for etwisenthquakes moreover illicit nuclear explosions.
sentences.chinese: 地震檢波器不只須監測地震，也要監測犯罪的核爆炸。

sentences.english: Detection is an integral part to national security.
sentences.chinese: 檢波是國家安全的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The seismometers are usually termed geophones.
sentences.chinese: 地震計一般稱爲地震檢波器。

sentences.english: Mounting on marsh string, Land and water string.
sentences.chinese: 適用於沼澤，水陸兩用檢波器串。

sentences.english: Earthquakes are recorded with a seismometer, also known as a seismograph.
sentences.chinese: 地震檢波器，也被稱爲測振儀，可記錄地震。

sentences.english: It is scarcely practical to consider deep burial of the detectors on land.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎不能考慮在陸地上深埋檢波器。

sentences.english: The acquisition system obtains the geological information through the geophone in seism prospecting.
sentences.chinese: 地震勘探工作中，地震儀通過地震檢波器採集信號。

sentences.english: The working principle and structure of piezoelectric acceleration geophone is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了壓電加速度地震檢波器的工作原理和結構。

sentences.english: By using wavelet transform, the emission of HHG in different time is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 於是在B點的檢波器將記出反射波到達的時刻。
